person_description: For me, it�s personal. My little sister ....   I am determined to help prevent gender-based violence through approaches connecting women and men with fairness and respect, and to bring all a variety of personally useful life skills at the touch of a button.
external_office: Gender, Inclusion and Community Systems and trained Life Coach.

person_description: I was blessed to have been brought up by strong women.  My grandmother and mother were simply strong, honest, dedicated and believed in equal opportunity for girls to resources, education and voices. I am determined to lend my voice and strength to the voiceless.
external_office: Gender and Human Rights and trained counsellor

person_description: In 24 years of existence, I have experienced stigmas, objectification of my body, biases based on my gender and misconceptions based on me being a woman. I want to help people observe issues with sensitivity and take decisions based on rationality than illogical standards.

One of the major differences between a thriving society and a broken one is the presence of women who are valued. Nepali woman are bound by limiting norms which prevent us from talking about innermost feelings. At Smart Naari all can come out in the open and share their views and problems with sense of security and belonging, regardless of their gender identities and sexual  orientation.

I work at the interface between technology and social welfare. The drive to develop location based technical applications that have social impact prompted me to start Naxa. Through Smart Naari, a greater social impact will be achieved.

I am who I am because of self-made women. I grew up watching my mother struggle to become who she is today, supporting the cause of equality and empowerment. She and women like her inspire me, and I truly believe that helping women become �SMART NAARI� will help society as a whole.
external_office: Founder of Data Nepal Pvt. Ltd.

person_description: I am enthusiastic about Geo-informatics as a vital domain for development. I am deeply interested in investing my expertise in using technology to bring positive changes in our society and wholeheartedly support SMART NAARI�s cause in preventing gender based violence.
